## wrapStream() function

Wrap a stream so that a readstream can be detected in node without loading the module in the browser.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function wrapStream(data: any): Promise<any>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | any |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;
